name: MIA
description:
16 kidnapped celebrities have been tasked with retrieving relics of unimaginable value to win back their freedom. Deadly threats await them around every turn. Either they escape with a relic or die trying. This is their last chance for survival. This is MIA.

Early Access includes following features and content

  • Character selection
  • Gunplay
  • (Online & LAN) Matchmaking
  • Custom Games
  • An Island Map to play
  • Walkietalkie (Voice chat feature)
